short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Leverage the UTXO model to manage your digital assets with a secure, scalable, and interoperable experience.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Unlock the Power of UTXO-Based Digital Assets with UTXO Global Wallet

Why Choose UTXO Global?
Step into a world where the UTXO model brings unmatched security, scalability, and flexibility to managing your digital assets—all from the convenience of your Chrome browser.

✨ Key Highlights:

🌐 Multi-Account Flexibility
Effortlessly create multiple accounts using private keys or mnemonic phrases. Tailor your crypto experience your way.

🔗 Cross-Chain Management
Seamlessly manage assets across diverse UTXO-based blockchains like Bitcoin and Nervos Network. One extension, endless possibilities.

💪 Built on UTXO Excellence
Experience a powerhouse wallet supporting Bitcoin, Nervos, and more UTXO-based blockchains. Consolidate and manage all your digital assets with ease.

🚀 Ready for Mainnet & Testnet
Experiment, build, and transact confidently on both mainnet and testnet environments.

🌟 Seamless DApp Integration
Interact with DApps effortlessly, no matter your address type. Expand your crypto potential.

🌍 Global Accessibility
Access your digital assets from anywhere with multilingual support, bridging the crypto world for everyone.

📊 Unified Portfolio View
Stay in control with an intuitive dashboard showcasing all your UTXO-based holdings in one glance.

💼 Effortless UTXO Handling
Send, receive, and store UTXO assets like Inscriptions, BRC-20 tokens, and Runes—all within the extension.

Your Security, Your Control

Keep private keys on your device—never stored on any server.
Enjoy complete ownership and secure management of your digital assets.
UTXO Global Wallet - Where UTXO Technology Meets Global Innovation

Join a growing community of crypto enthusiasts and pioneers using UTXO Global Wallet for secure, efficient, and frictionless transactions.
Follow us on Twitter: https://x.com/UTXOGlobal

Download today and experience the future of UTXO-powered wallets!
